thread.title: Tamar Braxton Releases New Album “Calling All Lovers”
thread.title_full: Tamar Braxton Releases New Album “Calling All Lovers”

author: Editorial Dept
title: Tamar Braxton Releases New Album “Calling All Lovers”
text:
0 comments 
Grammy-nominated singer, songwriter, and television personality Tamar Braxton released her highly anticipated third studio album Calling All Lovers . The album includes her hit single “If I Don’t Have You” which remains in the Top 10 on Billboard’s Urban Adult Contemporary Chart and her most recent single releases: “Angels & Demons” and “Catfish” –who’s music video will debut in the coming weeks. 

Most Recently, Tamar Braxton announced she’ll be hitting the road this November with Grammy-Nominated singer, KEM , on the “Promise To Love Tour”. The “Promise To Love” tour is set to kick off November 6th in Los Angeles, CA — running through Richmond, New York, Detroit, Cleveland, Chicago, Baltimore and more — and finally wrapping on December 6th in South Haven, Mississippi. 

In addition to her new album, Tamar recently joined the 21st season of ABC’s popular TV show “Dancing With The Stars”, now entering its 3rd week with Tamar and her dance partner Val Chmerkovskiy holding the #1 position/highest score . The new season premiered on Monday, September 14th— the same day her #1 rated daily talk show, “The Real” returned for its 2 nd season on FOX where Braxton performed her new single “King” . Tamar’s hit reality show “Tamar & Vince” will be returning to WE TV for a 4 th season– where Tamar not only displays the characteristics of a true “star” — but her ability to balance an entertainment career, motherhood, business and philanthropy.
